bio:
Shani Raja was a senior editor and in-house writing trainer at The Wall Street Journal. During a long and distinguished journalism career, Shani has written for many other top news organizations too, including The Economist, Time, the FT, Dow Jones and Bloomberg News. Shani left journalism to teach the world the slick writing and storytelling techniques known only to top newspaper reporters and editors. His bestselling online writing courses have already helped hundreds of thousands of people—including bloggers, authors, business writers, college students and Tedx presenters—to superpower their copywriting skills.
|
shortsummary:Former senior editor and in-house writing trainer at The Wall Street Journal. Shani has written for many other top news organizations including The Economist, Time, the FT, Dow Jones and Bloomberg News. Shani now teaches the world professional writing techniques.
title: Renowned writer and teacher; Written, edited & trained for The Wall Street Journal, The Economist, Time & Bloomberg News.
